articles.title: Doctors at small clinics struggling to get COVID-19 vaccines in Washington - KING 5
articles.description: Doctors at some small clinics are frustrated with how long it’s taking for them to get COVID-19 vaccines: “It's a lot of dead ends."More: https://www.king5.c...

articles.author: News18
articles.title: Vaccine Success? 1 in 1 Lakh People Have Had Severe Reactions to Pfizer Jab, US Study Claims - News18
articles.description: Roughly one in a hundred thousand people who received the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine have had severe allergic reactions, US health officials said Wednesday while stressing that the benefits of immunization greatly outweigh the known risks.
